Welcome to My Rubik’s Cube App!
There are two main modes:
1. Scan Cube: - Press "Scan Cube" to enter the colors of your Rubik’s Cube, one face at a time. - For each face, you have two options: • Tap on individual boxes to select a color from the available options. • Or simply tap the center of the face to activate your camera and scan the entire face in one go. - Please note: The cube’s centers are pre-assigned as follows: UP (white), LEFT (orange), FRONT (green), RIGHT (red), BACK (blue), and DOWN (yellow). Make sure that when entering the colors, these assignments are respected. - Once you have entered all the colors correctly, tap "Generate String." This will display an animation of the cube and then use our built-in algorithm to solve it step by step.
2. Play Game: - Press "Play Game" to interact with a virtual Rubik’s Cube. - Rotate the cube using touch controls. - Use the Undo and Redo features to adjust your moves. - Challenge yourself by scrambling the cube and then attempting to solve it manually.
Use the info icon (located at the top-left of the main menu) to view these instructions anytime.
Enjoy and happy cubing!
